Name: eq
Desc: Returns a specific node by index.
Long Desc: The 'eq' method allows you to retrieve a specific node from the set of matched elements by its index. This is particularly useful when you need to work with a single element from a collection of elements selected by a query. The method ensures that the returned node is wrapped in the Q object, maintaining chainability.
Example: const secondItem = Q('.list-item').eq(1); // Retrieves the second list item
